data.title: Southwest Airlines Sacramento International Airport
data.meta_description: Terminal B at SMF will be your destination after leaving your place for the airport. Once you reach the Terminal, you can look for the check-in counter to collect your boarding pass.
data.text:
When it comes to low-cost flights, Southwest is one of the biggest names in the aviation industry. Also, the airline has commenced its operations 52 years ago. Currently, the airline is working with a fleet size of 820 aircraft covering almost 121 destinations around the globe.

Southwest Airlines at Sacramento International Airport – SMF Terminal B is the active terminal from which all the passengers get services. Visit the terminal to get your boarding pass from the booking and reservation counter. You can also change your flight ticket if you want to correct anything.

Southwest Operational Terminal at SMF Airport

Whether looking for the reservation counter, baggage claim area, currency exchange counters, or ATMs, you’ll get everything at Terminal B at SMF International Airport. Southwest Airlines operates all its departure and arrival flights from the same terminal. All the lounges, cafes, shopping stores, duty-free shops, restaurants, etc., are available there.

If you reach the airport hours before the scheduled flight departure time, you can directly head towards the terminal to rest in the noiseless and peaceful restroom. You can take some refreshments and enjoy your favorite food at the restaurants and lounges. These places also offer some unique and special cuisines that you must try.

Transfer Between Terminals

Passengers at SMF can easily connect between the terminals through various transfer modes. You can reach your destination terminal in no time by walking or using the terminal shuttle.

Walking Through Bridge

Terminals A and B are connected, and everyone has access to the level of the terminals through the parking garage. It will take approximately 7 minutes to reach from Terminal A to Terminal B. The sky bridge from Terminal A is accessible from Level 2, and from Terminal B, you can access the bridge from Level 3.

Shuttle Service

If you use the daily parking shuttle service, it will take approximately 10 minutes to reach your desired terminal, and the shuttle service is free of cost. You can get the shuttle from outside of the terminals.

SMF Additional Services

Passengers traveling from SMF International Airport may also require a shuttle, taxi, bus, etc., to transfer between the terminals. SMF provides a dedicated transportation service to passengers for various routes and zones.

Bus Service

Buses from the SMF International Airport allow passengers to reach SMF to their desired destinations in Downtown, Davis, Woodland, etc. It offers SacRT, Sacramento Regional Transit District Route 142 express bus service from SMF to Downtown every 20 to 30 minutes daily. Yolobus is another route 42A and 42B Bus service between Downtown Sacramento, West Sacramento, Woodland, SMF, and Davis.

Private Shuttle Service

You can also get shared and private-ride shuttle service booked through the SuperShuttle Express. Southwest Passengers can reach Zone 4 of Terminal B’s ground transportation area to get the shuttle service.

Taxi Service

Those passengers willing to travel by private vehicle can book an on-demand taxi outside the terminals. One can head to the Zone 3 of the Terminal B to book an on-demand taxi.

SMF Airport Detailed Information

You may need contact information while traveling so the journey will be smooth and you can travel stress-free. The tables mentioned below will help you collect all the airport and airlines related information from this page, including the address of the airport, terminal information, official website, social handles, etc.:

About Southwest Airlines

Service & Amenities

Traveling can be the most wonderful experience if you get breathtaking services on the flight or at the SMF airport. However, Southwest doesn’t compromise with its services; you can expect a marvelous journey, no matter the destination booked. The services offered by the airline are all outstanding and first-class.

Flight Booking: Booking a new flight is not a herculean task, and you can follow any available methods to book a flight at your convenience. The airline allows you to make an online reservation through the official website or mobile app, via phone, self-serve kiosk, or at the airport.

Manage My Trip: The Manage My Trip option changes your booked flight. You can do the same if you want to change your name or anything else on your flight ticket. The methods available are online change, on-call, or the airline’s booking counter at the airport. You can choose the first options as these are the most convenient options to make

Check-in Process: If you are planning to complete the check-in process at the airport, you can expect a long queue and a lot of effort. This is because everyone follows the same process. But you can easily avoid the queues and complete the check-in quickly. All you have to do is visit the official website and click the online check-in option.

Flight Cancellation: Emergencies are always possible, and Southwest Airlines fully understands this. That’s why Southwest Airlines provides a very flexible flight cancellation policy. To cancel your flight anytime, visit the official website or app and select the Cancel Flight option. Alternatively, you can contact the airline’s staff or visit the airport cancellation counter personally to request the flight cancellation.

Special Assistance Support: Traveling with the patient or having serious health issues while traveling is difficult. That’s why Southwest Airlines allows passengers to request special assistance. Whether passengers need a wheelchair, priority boarding, medications, POC Portable Oxygen Concentrator, etc., the airline will be there to provide them. You must request special assistance and inform the airline about your requirements. The airline will provide all the required help when you reach the airport.

Lost and Found: What will happen if you lose your luggage at the airport? There is no need to worry, and you can immediately visit the lost and found counter to inform the ground staff about the problem. The counter executive will then file a complaint and take the appropriate action to find the baggage.

SMF Lounges

Sacramento International Airport has 2 active Escape Lounges available on different terminals. Whether you want to catch up on work in a peaceful and noiseless environment with high-speed internet wi-fi or want to take a short nap, they have got you covered. The lounge will offer you a bar, dining area, etc.:

Escape Lounge at Concourse A: Also, the operational hours of the lounge are from 5 am to 8 pm open all day.

Escape Lounge at Concourse B: The Lounge is located just after the security checkpoint and opens from 5 am to 8 pm.

Unfortunately, access to the lounges is not free, and passengers may have to pay the cost of entry. The entry fee may cost $45 if you purchase it at the airport and $40 when booked online at least 24 hours prior. Only passengers with The Platinum Card from American Express, American Express – The Business Platinum Card, or American Express Centurion Card will get complimentary access.

Terminal Parking Information

Airport terminal B has a dedicated parking space so passengers traveling with their own vehicle can park without any problem. Terminal B has an Hourly Lot of the terminal where passengers can easily walk between the parking lot and the terminal through the pedestrian bridge on Level 3. However, the parking facility is not completely free, and one has to pay a fee of $2 for 30 minutes. There is a maximum daily limit of $30.

Pick-Up and Drop-Off Parking Facility

Sacremento offers a free waiting area, which helps the airport manage the vehicle traffic within the airport. It is located near the west economy parking lot, where visitors can wait. However, the vehicle visitor can only wait up to 3 hours maximum.

Airport Car Rental Service

Passengers can also rent a car at the airport from the rental car center located south of the terminal. Passengers can book a car from any of the below-mentioned rental car companies that are operational at SMF:

Alamo

Avis

Budget

Dollar

Enterprise

Hertz

National

Payless

Thrifty

Zipcar

Wrap Up!

SMF International Airport is a top-ranked airport in terms of overall passenger satisfaction, services offered, lounges, and wi-fi facilities. If you are visiting the airport and traveling with your pet, you can directly reach Southwest Airlines at Terminal B, where you’ll have access to a pet relief area, and your pet can roam freely.

Find Southwest Airlines Terminals at different Airport

FAQs – People Also Asked
